Name: Alice Mine
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Medium-dry with luscious orange notes. The orange zest twist is essential to the balance of this late-night sipper.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Alice Mine contains 156 calories
